text: Va ʙa moli jatim nazdik masaved, magar ʙa nekutarin vache, ki ʙa foidai u ʙosad, to ʙa sinni ʙuluƣ rasad. Va pajmonavu vaznro az rui adl komil kuned! Mo ʙa kase cuz ʙa andozai tavonoias taklif namekunem. Va har goh suxan gued, odilona gued, harcand ʙa zijoni xesovandonaton ʙosad. Va ʙa ahdi Alloh vafo kuned! Inhost on ci Alloh sumoro ʙa on suporis mekunad, ʙosad, ki pand gired
